This is a known problem with the way you have installed Eclipse.  Please 
follow the instructions in this FAQ entry.

http://dev.eclipse.org/viewcvs/index.cgi/%7Echeckout%7E/platform-swt-
home/faq.html#konquerorUnzip

If the FAQ does not solve your problem, please reopen this bug report.

This question comes up every day in the newsgroup, the problem should be noted
on the download-page very clearly.
